data.actual_result: It stays and only disappears after manually removing/clicking on it or when a new notification with a badge arrives.
data.short_description: Push notifications don't disappear automatically for servers with notifications for all messages
data.steps_to_repro: - Open any server and go to the notification settings - Set the notification settings to all messages - Close out of Discord - Go to another account and send a message in this server - Go back to your first account and open Discord again (not via the push notification!) - Go to the channel which caused the push notification and mark it as read (also works with a second device or the desktop app)
